name: Da Killa Bees - Clatys project
tagline: Bringing Google to your flower pot!
body:
# Welcome to Basel Killa Bees!

## Make an automatic watering system in a day!

We're part of GDGBasel. On December 5th, we participated to a [GDGBasel Hackathon](http://hackathon.gdgbasel.com).
Our goal: **Make a cloud watering system, in one day!**

## About us
### Team
- Mimoun
- Manuel
- Julien
- François

### Hardware
- IoT - Onion Omega

### Partners
- [Google](http://www.google.com)
- [GDG Basel](http://gdgbasel.com)
- [Firebase](http://www.firebase.com/)
- [Onion](http://onion.io/)
- [LaunchLabs](http://www.launchlabs.ch/)
- [Sogeti](http://www.sogeti.ch/)
